heroSection.heading: Connect with Your Neighbours, Grow Your Business
heroSection.paragraph: Join the beta and be the first to connect with local businesses in Hakika Estate. Discover, support, and engage with entrepreneurs right in your community

discoverSection.heading: DISCOVER NEIGHBORS
discoverSection.paragraph: Jirani Connect is a platform designed to foster community connections with Hakika Estate. It allows residents to showcase their businesses and goods, making it easier for neighbors to discover and support local enterprises. Whether youâ€™re looking to expand your business reach or simply prefer to buy from trusted neighbors, Jirani Connect bridges the gap, creating a thriving local economy.

cards.title: Sign Up
cards.description: Create an account and set up a profile for your business. Add details about what you offer and how neighbors can reach you.

cards.title: Post Your Goods & Services
cards.description: List your products or services,including descriptions, prices,and availability. Make your business known within the community.

cards.title: Connect with Neighbors
cards.description: Engage with other residents  who are interested in what you offer. Facilitate transactions and build lasting relationships with your customers.
